original: 「同舉義兵，為救江山社稷。今逆賊將掃滅，卻如此爭鬥，我要與誰戮力同心，回天轉日呢?」 (語畢便流下淚來)
text: "Together with the righteous soldiers, to save the country and the mountains. Today the rebels will be wiped out, but they are fighting like this. Who do I want to work together to return to the sky and turn to the next day?" (After the sentence, I shed tears)
